application_information.description: Contest Store allows users to participate in various contests to win high-quality products. The platform ensures a seamless and rewarding experience for all users.
application_information.about_this_app:
Contest Store allows users to participate in various contests to win high-quality products. The platform ensures a seamless and rewarding experience for all users. 
  Key Features: 
 - **Participate in Contests**: Join contests to win top-quality products. 
 - **User-Friendly Interface**: Enjoy a smooth and engaging user experience. 
 - **Secure Transactions**: Enhanced security features to protect user data and ensure safe transactions. 
 For more information or support, visit the [Contest Store Help Center](https://joincontest.store/help) or contact Contest Store support at [support@joincontest.com](mailto:support@joincontest.com).
application_information.required_os: Android 6.0> or iOS 12.0> or Web Browser
